TopicTitle: Clear Backgrounds on Flags (when on capsules/ships)

Articles.Content:
I put in a few custom flags, but really think the white rectangle behind the icon is a bit of an eye sore when on a capsule. Is there a way to make the background of the "flag", in this case the white background not appear on the capsules?

I tried removing the background through other programs and then re-uploading but that didn't seem to work.
Are you sure you've edited the images to have a transparent background?

Yeah, the image needs to be .png and have a transparent background for that to work. It won't be transparent on planted flags, however.

Also, OP, where is your signature gif from?
Found your signature.
